premise_source_doc_sentence: According to Lee Allen , Cincinnati writer and eventual director of the Baseball Hall of Fame , the Worcester club had been especially instrumental in having the Reds expelled after 1880 .

premise_source_doc_sentence: The first National League Cincinnati Reds club in 1880 , the current Cincinnati Reds franchise from 1882 to 1883 and the Cincinnati Outlaw Reds of the Union Association in 1884 .

claim: Reds was co-written by the movie's director.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The theme for the Reds was `` Redemption '' after a disastrous 1971 season that saw the Reds fall from a World Series participant in 1970 to a sub .500 team a year later .

claim: Reds was co-written by the movie's director.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In his 1948 book , The Cincinnati Reds , Allen took some satisfaction in pointing out that when the Reds re-formed in 1882 , it was the same year that Worcester 's days as a major league franchise , as well as its influence , came to an end .

claim: Reds was co-written by the movie's director.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In fact , the March 13 , 1972 , Sports Illustrated edition featured the Reds on the front cover headlining `` Redemption for the Reds . ''
